title: Survival in the hills
creator_credit: Explorer Films, Peter Halket, Maurice Dybeck and Christopher Were
brief_description: Aimed at anyone who is responsible in any way for mountain safety, whether as a leader or merely for themselves. Covers topics including: things that can go wrong; all aspects relating to exposure; suitable food and drinks; how to get help map and compass work; detours; accidents and simple first aid; and a summary of helpful general rules
